problem.markdown:
>>When using Endurance Training Machines, what are the variables to consider?<<
( ) exercise duration and training intensity ( ) training frequency, exercise duration, and training intensity ( ) exercise mode, training method, exercise repetitions (x) exercise mode, training frequency, exercise duration, and training intensity
[explanation] exercise mode, training frequency, exercise duration, and training intensity [explanation]
problem.p: When using Endurance Training Machines, what are the variables to consider?

choicegroup.label: When using Endurance Training Machines, what are the variables to consider?
choicegroup.choice: training frequency, exercise duration, and training intensity
exercise mode, training method, exercise repetitions
exercise mode, training frequency, exercise duration, and training intensity

div.p: exercise mode, training frequency, exercise duration, and training intensity
